text: Odelya Halevi (; born 12 February 1989) is an Israeli actress. She appears on the American drama television series Law & Order and plays the role of Assistant District Attorney Samantha Maroun. She also played Angelica in the American television series Good Trouble. She also appeared in the television series Good Girls Revolt. She has made appearances in television series such as Mike & Molly, New Girl, NCIS, MacGyver (2016) and Why Women Kill. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli television actors Category:Jewish Israeli actors
title: Odelya Halevi
